```{python}
#| label: risk-mitigation
#| echo: false

import pandas as pd
import plotly.graph_objects as go
import plotly.express as px

# Risk mitigation strategies from investor-risk-analysis.md
risk_data = pd.DataFrame({
    'Risk Type': [
        'Fundraising Risk',
        'Political Risk',
        'Timeline Risk',
        'Financial Risk',
        'Execution Risk'
    ],
    'Traditional VC Risk Level': [8, 3, 7, 9, 8],
    'dFDA Mitigated Risk': [2, 4, 3, 2, 4],
    'Mitigation Strategy': [
        'Assurance Contract (auto-refund)',
        'Metaculus prediction markets',
        'Front-loaded payouts (2.6x Year 1)',
        'First-loss capital buffer',
        'Open-source + bounties'
    ]
})

# Create radar chart comparing risks
categories = risk_data['Risk Type'].tolist()
categories.append(categories[0])  # Close the polygon

fig = go.Figure()

# Traditional VC risks
traditional = risk_data['Traditional VC Risk Level'].tolist()
traditional.append(traditional[0])

# Mitigated risks
mitigated = risk_data['dFDA Mitigated Risk'].tolist()
mitigated.append(mitigated[0])

fig.add_trace(go.Scatterpolar(
    r=traditional,
    theta=categories,
    fill='toself',
    name='Traditional VC Risk',
    fillcolor='rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.2)',
    line=dict(color='red', width=2)
))

fig.add_trace(go.Scatterpolar(
    r=mitigated,
    theta=categories,
    fill='toself',
    name='dFDA with Mitigation',
    fillcolor='rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2)',
    line=dict(color='green', width=2)
))

fig.update_layout(
    polar=dict(
        radialaxis=dict(
            visible=True,
            range=[0, 10],
            tickmode='linear',
            tick0=0,
            dtick=2
        )
    ),
    title='Risk Profile: Traditional VC vs dFDA with Mitigation',
    showlegend=True,
    height=500
)

fig.show()

# Display mitigation strategies
print("\n=== Key Risk Mitigation Innovations ===")
for _, row in risk_data.iterrows():
    print(f"\n{row['Risk Type']}: {row['Mitigation Strategy']}")
    reduction = ((row['Traditional VC Risk Level'] - row['dFDA Mitigated Risk']) /
                 row['Traditional VC Risk Level'] * 100)
    print(f"  â†’ Risk reduced by {reduction:.0f}%")
